data.persona: I am a soldier of His Majesty's Army. The King has selected a few of us to be Knights. I am very proud to fight for my land. We will be strong and defeat the enemy.
data.description:
You are in the Knife Seller.
The wooden shop's walls are adorned with a variety of steel, iron, and bronze knives. They vary in shape and size, with some being curved and others being small enough to conceal.
The jester and the blacksmith are here.

You are carrying a bag, wearing an armor and a tunic, and wielding a pic axe, a giant club, and a spears.

data.short_motivation: I want to slip the bag into the jester's pocket, unbeknownst to him
data.mid_motivation: I want to arrest the jester, capturing him with the king's silverware on his person
data.long_motivation: I want the jester to rot away in jail because he makes fun of our wonderful king
